oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Council and Executive Subcommittee Reports, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The final report proposed the formation of a Legislative Council to establish future governmental policy. The Council would be made up of 21 elected officials serving unlimited 4-year terms. Included here is a subcommittee document that discusses the advantages and disadvantages of Run-Off and Plurality elections.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Government executives
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
